function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Development of Lab-in-a-Tube, Lab-in-a-Box, and Lab on-a-Drone systems for disease diagnosis","Impact":"Increased potential for disease spread due to widespread and rapid diagnostic capabilities","Mitigation":"Implement strict containment measures for the handling and disposal of samples and equipment","Technologies":"Advanced containment systems, automated disinfection technologies, and remote monitoring tools","People":"Public health workers, laboratory technicians, researchers","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions, and government agencies"},{"Description":"Rapid development and deployment of POCT systems for pandemic diagnosis","Impact":"Risk of inaccurate or unreliable test results leading to delayed intervention or inappropriate treatment","Mitigation":"Conduct rigorous validation and quality control of POCT systems, and provide comprehensive training for users","Technologies":"Advanced quality control methods, AI-powered diagnostic algorithms, and real-time data sharing platforms","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, public health agencies","Owner":"Regulatory bodies, healthcare organizations, and diagnostic technology developers"},{"Description":"Global emphasis on the need for rapid and sensitive detection techniques like biosensors","Impact":"Potential reliance on unvalidated or inaccurate biosensor technologies for disease detection","Mitigation":"Establish standardized validation protocols and regulatory oversight for biosensor technologies","Technologies":"Validation standards, quality assurance frameworks, and data interoperability platforms","People":"Healthcare providers, patients, diagnostic technology developers","Owner":"Regulatory authorities, standardization bodies, and healthcare organizations"}]}
